item.title: VOLVO FH 2024 1.53 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 7, 2025

VOLVO FH 2024 1.53 ETS2

The Volvo FH 2024 1.53 is a modern and highly advanced truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2, updated to be compatible with game version 1.53. Known for its sleek design, cutting-edge technology, and powerful engine options, this truck offers a premium driving experience. The updated version includes enhanced features, improved performance, and detailed customization options, making it a top choice for players seeking a realistic and immersive trucking experience. Its compatibility with version 1.53 ensures smooth gameplay, while its realistic handling and detailed design make it a standout option for virtual truckers. Perfect for long-haul routes and heavy cargo transport.

Credits: PAULO JUNIOR

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 7, 2025

SCANIA 112H 1.53 ETS2

The Scania 112H 1.53 is a classic and iconic truck mod featured in Euro Truck Simulator 2, often available through modding communities. Known for its retro design and reliable performance, this truck offers a nostalgic driving experience with modern customization options. Its compatibility with game version 1.53 ensures smooth gameplay, making it a popular choice for players who appreciate vintage-style trucks with a touch of modern functionality. Perfect for those who enjoy a blend of old-school charm and practical hauling capabilities.

item.title: Old Leyland Bus Mod 1.28-1.36 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | March 7, 2025

Old Leyland Bus Mod 1.28-1.36 ETS2

Old Leyland Bus Mod For Ets2 1.28-1.36
The **Old Leyland Bus Mod** for *Euro Truck Simulator 2* (ETS2) is a mod that introduces a classic Leyland bus into the game, providing players with an opportunity to drive a vintage British vehicle in their virtual world. This mod is compatible with ETS2 versions 1.28 to 1.36, allowing those using these specific versions to enjoy the mod’s features.

Key Features:
– **Vehicle Model:** The mod features a detailed, retro Leyland bus that captures the essence of the classic British bus design, complete with accurate exterior and interior features.
– **Authentic Sound:** The bus comes with realistic engine sounds that match the era of the vehicle, enhancing the immersion for players.
– **Customizable:** As with many ETS2 mods, the bus offers some level of customization, letting players modify certain aspects of the vehicle, such as the paint job or accessories, to make it unique to their virtual fleet.
– **Driving Experience:** Driving the Old Leyland bus offers a different experience compared to standard trucks in ETS2. It comes with a unique handling style, making it feel like a distinct vehicle to drive.
– **Compatibility:** The mod is designed for versions 1.28 to 1.36 of ETS2, ensuring stability and proper integration with those game versions.

Installation:
To install the Old Leyland Bus Mod, players typically download the mod files and place them in the “mod” folder of the ETS2 directory. Afterward, they can enable it in the game’s mod manager before starting a new game or continuing an existing one.

This mod offers a nostalgic experience for fans of classic buses and provides a refreshing alternative to the usual heavy trucks in *Euro Truck Simulator 2*.

Credits: Manav Kummil Massdriller Youtube

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
